title: Grim.Legends.3.The.Dark.City.Collectors.Edition.MULTi11-PROPHET
description:
.k
proudly announces
Grim Legends 3: The Dark City CE (c) Artifex Mundi 

release date ...: October 2769 
protection .....: Steam 
# of discs .....: 1 
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT-BR/KR/JP/CN-S 
--------------------------------------------------- 

The third installment in the casual hidden-objects 
adventure game series, developed by Polish studio 
Artifex Mundi. You play as Sylwia, an amnesiac 
acolyte of the monster-hunting Order. When a 
powerful artifact, containing a malevolent being 
known as the Nightmare, is stolen from the Order's 
headquarters, Sylwia and her mentor embark on a 
quest to find it. During her journey she fights not 
only the forces of evil, lurking in the underground 
of a grim gothic city of Lichtenheim, but also the 
dark secrets of her own past. Grim Legends 3: The 
Dark City follows closely in the footsteps of its 
predecessors and the genre as a whole. It's an 
adventure game with an absorbing plot, and the 
gameplay focuses on searching locations, which are 
filled with hidden objects. The game also features 
many mini-games and logic puzzles, further 
developing the story.
1- Unpack, burn or mount
